data.title: Football Predictions & Betting Tips
data.meta_description: Free football predictions from our expert tipsters. The latest soccer betting tips, match previews and best odds.
data.text:
Free Football Predictions

Football is the world’s most popular sport when it comes to online betting. Every day, sportsbook customers in countries across the planet look to place bets on the outcome of the latest matches. Naturally, it helps to have an idea of what is likely to happen in the next match.

Here at Sportsgambler.com, we make it our job to provide free football predictions across all the leading competitions. You can get in-depth match previews and soccer betting tips and a strong idea of what is likely to happen for each game.

Predictions for Today

Our tipsters are very knowledgeable when it comes to this popular sport, especially the English game including the Premier League and The Championship. We also have experts when it comes to European matches and there are lots of popular leagues including Spanish La Liga, Italian Serie A and German Bundesliga.

Our team have decades of professional experience when it comes to the gambling industry and we know which markets offer the best value to punters. We’re always looking for the best football predictions today and throughout the season and we would only make recommendations that we ourselves are happy to back with our own money.

Bet Builder Predictions

If you are interested in placing a multiple bet on the same match, then you’ve come to the right site. Our experts enjoy creating bet builders so that you can enjoy a same game parlay on various fixtures taking place on a daily basis.

We put plenty of careful research into our picks and the football bet builder tips can hopefully point you in the right direction. We look at lots of different angles to come up with the best recommendations.

FIFA World Cup

This tournament takes place every four years and there’s always tremendous excitement surrounding a competition where the leading nations are in direct competition. Bar the hosts, every country has to qualify for the finals, with the actual event itself featuring a group phase before the most successful sides go through to the knockout stage.

Every FIFA World Cup is a big betting extravaganza, with fans able to wager In-Play on the games and also place accumulator bets along with various bet builders.

Premier League

When it comes to domestic club football, there is no bigger competition than the English Premier League. This is a tournament which is enjoyed by fans all over the world, with the EPL season spanning several months and there are always some exciting tussles when it comes to the title, UEFA Champions League places and the EFL Championship relegation spots.

It goes without saying that bettors enjoy placing wagers on the Premier League matches and it’s no exaggeration to say that there are hundreds of pre-match markets available.

Free Football Betting Tips

Football betting tips isn’t always easy. After all, nobody has a crystal ball and there are often surprise results when a game takes place. However, there are plenty of stats that you can examine ahead of a particular match and that will help shape your views as to what might happen over the ninety minutes. It’s worth noting that you don’t have to predict the outcome on the Full-Time Result market and there are plenty of other options out there.

For example, you might come to the conclusion that it will be a low-scoring match between two particular sides, while there are several other angles including number of corners, number of cards, asian handicap or a particular player to score first or find the net at any stage of the game.

Expert Betting Tips

Sportsbook customers don’t just get the opportunity to bet on individual matches when they hold a bookmaker account. They can also bet on the winner of a particular league or competition such as the Copa America or European Championship. A gambling site will update this market on a frequent basis, so you can have an antepost wager before the competition starts or during it.

You can also bet on other antepost markets such as Relegation or Sack Race. We provide expert football betting tips for a market such as the Sack Race, where bookmakers price up each manager in a particular league and offer odds on who will leave their job first. This market has the beauty of being launched every time there is a sacking so punters can potentially win more than once.

Acca Tips

There is always a busy fixture schedule when the season is in full flow. The games come thick and fast, with our daily football accumulator tips giving you some great ideas when it comes to the right picks to make.

These might be certain teams to win the game, while there are alternative sportsbook markets such as Both Teams to Score and the Total Goals market Over/Under 2.5 Goals. Some punters even like making Asian Handicap acca bets which might include some insurance.

Best Football Odds

Nobody likes paying over the odds for a car or a holiday so why accept second-best when it comes to online betting on football? There are stacks of bookmakers who now offer a first-class service across the major leagues and competitions and it’s important to therefore pick out the odds which appeal the most on a consistent basis.

We would therefore recommend you consider opening a number of different bookmaker accounts so that you are able to compare the prices and get the best football odds that are available. Every betting site has their own trading team who will come up with odds based on their own research and it sometimes pays to get an early price before the bookies change this according to the weight of money.

Football Match Previews

Our expert writers don’t just provide free betting tips and daily accumulator bets. They also provide football match previews for the leading games and provide justification for why they’re making a particular pick. You can understand the reasoning why a tipster is siding with a team to win the next match, while they use a stats-based approach to back up their argument.

You might find yourself agreeing with what’s been written for a soccer prediction or alternatively you might use the content to shape your own unique view and we would always recommend that our readers bet according to their own opinion.
